# Government Tender Announcement
## Hangar Doors Request for Proposal

### Reference and Status
- **Reference Number**: WS4336602433
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4336602433
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Publication Date**: 2023-12-03
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-23T14:00:00 EST
- **Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-01-31
- **Region of Delivery**: Petawawa
- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Procurement Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Scope of Work
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the supply of labor, materials, tools, and equipment for the inspections and preventative maintenance, service, and repairs of various types of hangar doors at Garrison Petawawa. A mandatory site visit is scheduled for January 10th, 2024, at 13:00 EST.

### Requirements
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others.
- **No GSIN or NIBS codes applicable**
- **No regions of opportunity or delivery specified**
- **The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.**

### Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Keenan, Darlene (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: darlene.keenan@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **URL for Tender Notice**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18171688?extsite=MTgxNzE2ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
